attributes.action: For TFL to check all details on customers using Private Hire services.
attributes.additional_details:
We are not safe, we are exposed at risk getting customers with fake accounts into our Private Hire vehicles.
Very easy anyone to create a fake account and use fake credit cards and details.
Basically we are not safe
attributes.background:
check account details from customers 
no fake accounts
Increase our safety in Private Hire industry.
TFL and Private Hire operators must increase safety for drivers from Private Hire industry.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Licensing of taxis and private hire vehicles in London is a matter for the London Assembly and the London Mayor.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

We could accept a petition calling for changes to the framework for licensing taxis and private hire vehicles in England, but it would need to be clear what changes you want the Government to make to current licensing rules.
